_meta.description: Nutrient targets organized by life_stage > age_band > nutrient_code > target_type

target_types.RDA: Recommended Dietary Allowance - average daily intake sufficient for 97-98% of healthy individuals
target_types.AI: Adequate Intake - used when RDA cannot be determined; assumed adequate
target_types.UL: Tolerable Upper Intake Level - maximum daily intake unlikely to cause adverse effects
target_types.AMDR_MIN: Acceptable Macronutrient Distribution Range minimum (% of energy)
target_types.AMDR_MAX: Acceptable Macronutrient Distribution Range maximum (% of energy)

dha_mg.note: No specific DRI; recommendation is for pregnancy

pregnant_t2._note: Same as T1 for most micronutrients; energy increment handled separately

pregnant_t3._note: Same as T1/T2 for most micronutrients; energy increment handled separately

lactating_0_6._note: Exclusive breastfeeding (0-6 months postpartum). Highest nutrient demands.

lactating_7_12._note: Breastfeeding with complementary foods (7-12 months postpartum)
